snippet: At the store, Day of the Dead skeletons and skulls turn up on countless items, including magnets, shadow boxes and Christmas ornaments.
abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on Fuego 718, store that sells handmade ephemera from around the world in Williamsburg, Brooklyn.
lead_paragraph: At the store, Day of the Dead skeletons and skulls turn up on countless items, including magnets, shadow boxes and Christmas ornaments.

headline.print_headline: Enough Color to Wake the Dead
headline.main: Fuego 718 in Williamsburg, a Shop Where Every Day Is the Day of the Dead
